system.description: At 18th level, when you successfully hit the same target with two or more melee attacks in a single turn, you may spend 2 exertion points to deal extra bludgeoning damage equal to 2d8 + your Strength modifier. In addition, the target makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or becomes stunned until the end of your next turn.
